name: UISMEditorToolProperties
doc: Standard properties of the Transform Meshes operation

TransformMode: Transformation Mode controls the overall behavior of the Gizmos in the Tool
bSetPivotMode: When true, the Gizmo can be moved independently without affecting objects. This allows the Gizmo to be repositioned before transforming.
bShowSelectable: Show a highlight around all selectable instances
bShowSelected: Show a highlight around the selected instances
bHideWhenDragging: Hide the Selectable and Selected highlights when dragging with the Gizmos
